Generation IX.Scarlet: There are scant few reports of this creature being sighted. One short video shows it rampaging and spouting pillars of flame.
Generation IX.Violet: It resembles an eerie Pokémon once shown in a paranormal magazine. That Pokémon was said to be an Entei regenerated from a fossil.

Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero (Scarle: Area Zero (after starting Perrin 's questline in The Indigo Disk ; only one )
